VR Nodes

A navigation system for mobile-based Virtual Reality

An investigation into the challenges faced by designers and developers working on mobile-based VR projects. More specifically, this report looked into how navigation through a 3D space might be handled in such an app. I took a user-centered design approach and worked with a group of potential end-users during part of the project. The discussions and tasks I completed with them helped to inform the design of a proposed solution to the issue of navigation in a mobile VR application.
